5:
**.lang #** - will help you to change language 
**.create_hero #** - creating a Hero with # name
**.kick_hero #** - kick hero with # name out of party
**.stats** or **.full_stats**- your heroes stats
**.color** - to see all the colors
**.whereami** - to found out your location
**.go_to** - change location
7:
First of all you need to create a Hero
Use **.create_hero #** if you are ready 
**#** is for the name
For example *.create_hero Sir_Pussy*
Keep in mind you should create a unique Hero and you can't use symbols like . @ # /
9: Wanna know stats of your Hero? Type **.full_stats **
25: There is **no Heroes** in party to kick
